title: SCHEDULE OF BANK CHARGES FOR THE PERIOD FROM 01.07.2019 TO 31.12.2019 - English
file_name: SCHEDULE OF BANK CHARGES FOR THE PERIOD FROM 01.07.2019 TO 31.12.2019 - English.pdf
author: HBL Content
summary: The document outlines the Schedule of Bank Charges by HBL for various services from July 1, 2019, to December 31, 2019. Key services and charges include: Fund Transfers: Different fee structures based on transfer amounts (ranging from Rs. 7 to Rs. 475 per transaction for both small (Rs. 1 â€“ Rs. 200) and large amounts (up to Rs. 50,000). Cash Withdrawals: Fees at agent locations using Konnect by HBL, ranging from Rs. 7 to Rs. 325 per transaction based on the withdrawal amount. Money Transfers (IBFT): Charges for transferring money to other bank accounts through Konnect by HBL or CNIC, varying by amount. HBL Core Banking Account Transfers: Transaction fees based on the amount, from Rs. 25 to Rs. 225. Courier and Swift Charges: For local, intercity, and foreign correspondence, with charges for LCs and guarantees, as well as swift messages ranging from Rs. 100 to Rs. 1,500. Investment Banking & IPS Services: Negotiable fees, out-of-pocket expenses, and succession, arrangement, and advisory fees for services under investment and IPS. Government Business: Charges for Letters of Credit (LC) for government imports at concessional rates. The document also highlights fees for services such as mobile account opening, airtime top-up, balance inquiries, and cash deposits at agent locations, with some services being free of charge.
